column1: # This file includes the editions for any more complex work - edition relations that 1:1, e.g. any work that was split into two parts when published in Finnish. IDs are only references from works.csv, not used in the database. Comma is used to separate entities in works and translators.

column11: Novellit ilmestyneet aikaisemmin kokoelmissa "Rakkaani, kyyhkyläiseni" ja "Joku kaltaisesi").
